Banishment (C4 Abju): R60' Banishes target to home or demiplane (Cha neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Bestow Curse (C3 Necr): Touched suffers choice of Disadv on specified ability rolls, Disadv on attacks on self, require Wis save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level extends duration to conc or 10 min/8 hr/24 hr/permanent at level 4/5/7/9]
Call Lightning (C3 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R120' Bolt inflicts 3d10 HP lightning (Dex half) in 5' radius 1/rd for conc or 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Clairvoyance (C3 Divi): R1 mile Self sees or hears remotely through invisible sensor for conc or 10 min
Command (C1 Ench): R60' Target obeys self one-word command (Wis neg) [+Level affects +1 target]
Contagion (C5 Necr): Touched poisoned, diseased for 7 dy after failing 3 Con saves (3 successes neg)
Control Water (C4 [Tempest Domain] Tran): R300' 100' water rises 20', parts, redirects, or whirlpools for conc or 10 min
Cure Wounds (C1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+1 HP [+Level heals +1d8 HP]
Destructive Wave (C5 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): 30' radius inflicts 5d6 HP thunder and knocks prone (Con half HP, not prone)
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses poison for conc or 10 min
Fog Cloud (C1 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for conc or 1 hr [+Level increases radius +20']
Gentle Repose (C2 Necr): Touched corpse becomes immune to decay and animation for 10 dy

Lesser Restoration (C2 Abju): Touched becomes unblinded, undeafened, undiseased, unparalyzed, or unpoisoned
Light (C0 Evoc): Touched object lights 20' radius (Dex neg) for 1 hr
Locate Creature (C4 Divi): Self learns location of named creature or species w/in 1000' for conc or 1 hr
Mending (C0 Tran): Touch repairs small tear
Protection From Poison (C2 Abju): Touched unpoisoned and gains Adv on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc or 1 min

Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects for 1 min
Thunderwave (C1 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): 15' cu inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Con half, no push) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Tongues (C3 Divi): Touched understands and speaks any language for 1 hr

Destructive Wrath: Use Channel Divinity to maximize lightning or thunder damage
Divine Intervention: 10% chance of deity help 1/wk
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Thunderbolt Strike: Lightning damage pushes away Large and smaller creatures 10'
